alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 06 at 1:00AM AKST until March 06 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THIS MORNING NORTH OF GAKONA... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, Localized storm total amounts up to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph from Isabel Pass to Paxson creating blowing snow. * WHERE...Copper River Basin north of Gakona. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Winds will increase as snow begins to taper off overnight, which could cause areas of reduced visibility due to blowing snow, especially through Isabel Pass. If you must travel, plan extra time and carry an emergency kit.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
